name: Savanna Race
summary:
The best racing game on the savannah animals!
Savanna Race is a racing game with savannah animals.
Play with a zebra, a lion, a hippopotamus, a antelope, a elephant, a giraffe, a ostrich and a rhinoceros.
Avoid the obstacles on your way and pick up boosts to gain an advantage over your competitors.
Share your score on the Internet and try to stay in the world ranking.
If you agree, your location is detected automatically to display the flag of your country in the international scores table.
